thread.section_title: Foreign and national political news and analysis - San Francisco Chronicle
thread.title: AP Exclusive: Panama condo owners to Trump: You're fired!
thread.title_full: AP Exclusive: Panama condo owners to Trump: You're fired! - San Francisco Chronicle

author: Jeff Horwitz, Associated Press
title: AP Exclusive: Panama condo owners to Trump: You're fired!
text: Photo: Arnulfo Franco, AP FILE - This July 4, 2011, file photo, shows the Trump Ocean Club International Hotel and Tower, third building from left, in Panama City, Panama. The tale of a 70-story waterfront tower along Panama Bay that was managed by the Trump empire offers insight into the Republican presidential candidate's business traits, and hints about the management style that might be expected from a Trump White House. FILE - This July 4, 2011, file photo, shows the Trump Ocean Club... PANAMA CITY (AP) — The directors of the Trump Ocean Club met July 28 on urgent business. They needed to fire Donald Trump. FILE - This July 4, 2011, file photo, shows the Trump Ocean Club International Hotel and Tower, third building from left, in Panama City, Panama. The tale of a 70-story waterfront tower along Panama Bay that was managed by the Trump empire offers insight into the Republican presidential candidate's business traits, and hints about the management style that might be expected from a Trump White House. FILE - This July 4, 2011, file photo, shows the Trump Ocean Club... PANAMA CITY (AP) — The directors of the Trump Ocean Club met July 28 on urgent business. They needed to fire Donald Trump.
